roleset.name: to approve in advance
roleset.note: PREAPPROVE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. Comparison to approve.01. (from preapprove.01-v)

example.name: args 0 & 1, passive
example.text: The dealership took the extra step of having [all the paper work for the transaction]-1 pre-approved *-1 by Ebensburg's local lender, Laurel Bank.
example.arg: by Ebensburg's loca lender, Laurel Bank.

example.name: All args
example.text: He pre-approved funding for me to take a course in Excel.
example.arg: for me to take a course in Excel.
